Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

PART SIX - GENERAL OFFENSES CODE

Chap. 606. General Provisions; Administration and Enforcement.

Chap. 612. Liquor Control.

Chap. 618. Animals.

Chap. 624. Drugs.

Chap. 630. Gambling.

Chap. 634. Minor’s Curfew.

Chap. 636. Offenses Relating to Persons.

Chap. 642. Offenses Relating to Property.

Chap. 646. Park Conduct.

Chap. 648. Peace Disturbances.

Chap. 660. Safety, Sanitation and Health.

Chap. 666. Obscenity and Sex Offenses.

Chap. 668. Unclean Habitations.

Chap. 672. Weapons and Explosives.

Chap. 678. Weeds and Litter.

Chap. 698. Penalties and Sentencing.
